T04sanss14u:398: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājâpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnântare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditam abhiniviśet /
T04sanss14u:403: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnântare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate nôpalabhyate /
T04sanss14u:410: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśate /
T04sanss14u:414: kim ity ahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣur bhaveyaṃ /
T04sanss14u:419: mukto mocayeyam āśvastâśvāsayeyaṃ parinirvṛttaḥ parinirvāpayeyam iti /
T04sanss14u:420: pūrvā hi koṭir mahārāja na prajñāyate 'iśvaryâdhipatyānām anubhūya mānānāṃ /
T04sanss14u:425: atrânantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā svargāc ca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛtâivaṃ paṭhyate /
T04sanss14u:426: tad yathâpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ vālukāyām upanikṣipto 'vasīdati /
T04sanss14u:429: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānam anantayaśasaṃ tathâvasīdantaṃ /
T04sanss14u:437: hiraṇyavarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ sarvôpakaraṇavarṣaṃ cânubhūya caturo mahādvīpān adhyāvasitvā
T04sanss14u:438: śakrasyârdhâsanam ākramyātîcchayā na mukto 'tṛptâiva kāmaiḥ kālagatêti /
T04sanss14u:439: evaṃ tvaṃ mahārāja vyākuryêty evam uktvā ca rājânantayaśāḥ kālam akārṣīt /
T04sanss14u:442: smāt tarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyām udakasvabhāvo nâbhūn na bhaviṣyati na câitarhi vidyate /
T04sanss14u:443: evam eva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāravijñanāṃ svabhāvo nâbhūn na bhaviṣyati na câitarhi vidyatae ity ādi //
T04sanss14u:447: tac ca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtaṃ /
T04sanss14u:452: anājñeyo 'vijñeyo 'deśito 'prakāśito yāvad akriyo yāvan na lābho nâlābho na sukhaṃ na duṣkhaṃ na yaśo nâyaśaḥ /
T04sanss14u:466: katamâiṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T04sanss14u:467: kiṃ rūpam uta vedanâho śvit saṃjñôtâho saṃskārâtha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti /
T04sanss14u:469: na rūpaṃ yāvan na vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
T04sanss14u:475: tad evam anupalabhyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo 'tra buddhaḥ /
T04sanss14u:479: śūnyaṃ hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa yāvad vijñānaṃ //
T04sanss14u:486: sarvadharmā bhūtakoṭir anantakoṭir anāvaraṇakoṭir apratiṣṭhitakoṭir ity ādi //
T04sanss14u:491: aprakṛtikā hi bhagavan bodhir aprakṛtikāni ca pañcânantaryāṇi /
T04sanss14u:493: tathā vihasyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ /
T04sanss14u:500: bhūtakoṭir iti bhagavan yad uktaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devais tatra vayaṃ bhūtam api nôpalabhāmahe /
T04sanss14u:503: yo hi kaścid bhagavan bhūtam upalabhate /
T04sanss14u:504: koṭim api sa tasyôpalabhate dvaye câsau caratîti //
T04sanss14u:506: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhâbhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ /
T04sanss14u:507: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na satvaḥ supina yathâiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanss14u:509: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo 'sti vācaṃ /
T04sanss14u:510: na ca vacana câsya rakta vācām upalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo 'sti //
T04sanss14u:511: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na câsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ /
T04sanss14u:512: tathêmi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ //
T04sanss14u:514: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādubhūtaḥ /
T04sanss14u:515: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanss14u:516: yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddham asvabhāvam /
T04sanss14u:517: yatha rasu tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanss14u:518: yatha naru ihêndrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam /
T04sanss14u:519: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te 'ṅga śūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanss14u:520: puravara yathâṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na labdham /
T04sanss14u:521: yatha nagara tathâṅga sarvaśūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanss14u:522: mudita yatha narāga mukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā /
T04sanss14u:523: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanss14u:525: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nâpi snehadhātuḥ /
T04sanss14u:526: vimṛśatu bherîva te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanss14u:527: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati rāmayāmi lokam /
T04sanss14u:530: tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narêndra sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanss14u:531: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nâpi sa svatantraḥ /
T04sanss14u:532: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ //
T04sanss14u:535: satvaś câsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsatva sarvaṃ jagat /
T04sanss14u:537: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamatiṃ pūjema pūjâriham //
T04sanss14u:538: duṣkhaṃ cā sugatā [[DOUBT]] daśaddiśigataṃ nâivaṃ parīdṛśyate /
T04sanss14u:540: satveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devâtideva tvayā /
T04sanss14u:541: evaṃ bho jinapuṅgavā jinamataṃ ajñāta yathāvataḥ /
T04sanss14u:542: tena tvāṃ dvipadôttamā naravarāḥ pūjema pūjâriham //
T04sanss14u:543: satvānâiva na duṣkhaṃ śākyamuninā yasyâpanītaṃ dukhaṃ /
T04sanss14u:544: jātās te muditāś ca hṛṣṭamanaso 'ratīś ca tair nôditāḥ //
T04sanss14u:546: tasmāt pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalaṃ //
T04sanss14u:548: nâivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā nâiva pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ //
T04sanss14u:549: uktaṃ cô sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ /
T04sanss14u:550: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ //
T04sanss14u:551: bhāvethaḥ śamathaṃ vipaśyanam ayaṃ mārgaṃ dukhā śāntaye /
T04sanss14u:553: śāntās te bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliṣyate //
T04sanss14u:554: śamathaś câtha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve 'ti śūnyā mune /
T04sanss14u:555: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kvacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakaṃ /
T04sanss14u:559: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate so 'vastukaḥ /
T04sanss14u:560: yo 'vastukaḥ so 'pariniṣpannaḥ yo 'pariniṣpannaḥ sa nôtpadyate na nirudhyate /
T04sanss14u:562: yat triṣv apy adhvasu nôpalabhyate na tac cakṣur nêndriyaṃ kathaṃ tasya vyavahāro jñeyaḥ /
T04sanss14u:564: yāvad eva nāmamātraṃ nô tu khalu paramâ-
T04sanss14u:567: evaṃ cakṣuś cêndriyaṃ ca rikte muṣṭisadṛśam alīkam asadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāmoṣadharme bālôpalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam yāvad eva nāmamātram //
T04sanss14u:571: svapne yathā śiraśchedo dṛṣṭas te āsravakṣayaḥ /
T04sanss14u:573: atrâiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha /
T04sanss14u:576: syād yadi kiṃcid aśūnyaṃ na bhavej jinenâsya vyākaraṇam //
T04sanss14u:583: yat svabhāvaśūnyam ādarśamaṇḍale supariśuddhe saṃdṛśyate pratibi-
T04sanss14u:587: avikāraṃ dharmadhātum imāṃ ca pūjāṃ drumâṅgaśo vicārayasi /
T04sanss14u:590: yad api ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktaṃ /
T04sanss14u:591: śakaṭâṅga saṃnipātaṃ nirīkṣva śakaṭasya câiva kriyāṃ //
T04sanss14u:592: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu /
T04sanss14u:593: vātêritād iva taror yathā hi nivartate vahniḥ //
T04sanss14u:594: na ca māruto na ca taruś cetayati hutâśanaṃ ca yajane /
T04sanss14u:595: na nivartate vahnis tathâiva karmasya kartāraḥ //
T04sanss14u:596: yad api vadase na ca saṃcaya puṇyasya hi vidyate /
T04sanss14u:599: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇām āyuḥparimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin /
T04sanss14u:603: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharmôtpadyate utânutpannaḥ /
T04sanss14u:611: sā ca śūnyatā nôtpadyate na nirudhyate /
T04sanss14u:613: yady evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyôktā bhagavatā tasmāt sarvadharmā nôtpatsyante na nirotsyante /
T04sanss14u:616: evam eva kulaputra tathā yathâbhisaṃbudhyase sarvadharmā nôtpadyante na nirudhyante /
T04sanss14u:619: saṃskṛtā dharmôtpadyante nirudhyante cêty asya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ /
T04sanss14u:622: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyôttrāsapadaparihārârthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān utpadyante nirudhyante cêti /
T04sanss14u:623: na câtra kasyacid dharmasyôtpādo na nirodhêti //
T04sanss14u:625: tatra bhagavaṃś cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ /
T04sanss14u:633: yan na saṃsṛjyate tan na raṇati /
T04sanss14u:635: advitīyāś ca bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ parasparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti /
T04sanss14u:641: na saṃsaranti na parinirvānti nâite kasyacit /
T04sanss14u:643: nâite bhagavan dharmôdvijante na saṃkliśyante na vyavadāyante /
T04sanss14u:644: evam ahaṃ bhagavan jānāmy evam avabudhye /
T04sanss14u:647: evam ahaṃ jānāmy evam ahaṃ budhyāmîti /
T04sanss14u:649: na ca bhagavann āyatanānām evaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss14u:651: yo hy evaṃ jānāti sa na kenacit sārddhaṃ vivadati /
T04sanss14u:652: yan na vivadati tac chramaṇadharmam anusaratîti /
T04sanss14u:658: adarśanaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ darśanaṃ samyagdarśanam iti //
T04sanss14u:662: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramârthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayāt puruṣabhrāntiḥ syād /
T04sanss14u:674: yan mañjuśrīr apratiṣṭhānaṃ na tasya kiñcin mūlam iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmêti //
T04sanss14u:685: sukhena na rajyate duṣkhena na virajyate /
T04sanss14u:686: yo hy evaṃ lokadharmair na saṃhriyate sa śūnyatāṃ jānītae iti //
T04sanss14u:687: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kvacid anurāgo na virāgaḥ /
T04sanss14u:688: yasmin rajyeta tac chūnyam eva jānīte /
T04sanss14u:690: nâsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kvacid dharme rajyate vā virajyate vā tathā nâsau śūnyatāṃ
T04sanss14u:691: jānīte yaḥ kenacit sārddhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāc chūnyam eva jānīte tac chūnyam
T04sanss14u:696: iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrâvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvat kutra
T04sanss14u:700: sā câitadabhyāsāt sukaraṃ prahīyatae iti paragauravam ātmâvajñā câivaṃ bhāvanīyā //
T04sanss14u:701: yadi satvo yadi skandhāḥ kṣamatā sarvathā sthitā /
T04sanss14u:702: ekasya hi parâtmatvaṃ viruddhaṃ saṃbhavet kathaṃ //
T04sanss14u:703: vinâlambanam apy etad ācaranty eva dehinaḥ /
T04sanss14u:708: na tu me gauravāt saukhyam ihâpi janadurbhagāt //
T04sanss14u:714: śabdas tāvad acittatvān māṃ stautîti na saṃbhavaḥ /
T04sanss14u:715: paraḥ kila mayi prītêty ayaṃ me matibhramaḥ //
T04sanss14u:716: tattuṣṭyâiva mama prītiḥ sāmānye na sadā astu sā /
T04sanss14u:717: tatsukhena na cet kāryaṃ tena tuṣṭena kiṃ mama //
T04sanss14u:718: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
T04sanss14u:719: na me pareṇa tuṣṭena kāye saukhyam ihâṇv api //
T04sanss14u:722: na dharmo nâyur ārogyaṃ na balaṃ vandanâdibhiḥ /
T04sanss14u:738: sādṛśyād anyad apy etad vārisrotovad īkṣyate /
T04sanss14u:739: tad evêdam iti bhrāntyā tatve tiṣṭhāmy ato balāt //
T04sanss14u:740: avastu câitat sādṛśyaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca janayiṣyati /
T04sanss14u:741: ahaṃ câitac ca sarvaṃ ca na cirān na bhaviṣyati /
